mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MANUAL_REFUND (AUTH_TRANSACTION_ID, CORRELATION_ID, CTN, ITEM_NAME, MERCHANT_NAME, PAYMENT_DESCRIPTION, MERCHANT_CONTACT, TOTAL, ITEM_PRICE, TAX, SUB_NO, ACE_NO, BAN, UNIT_MDL, FEE_TYPE, TRANSACTION_TYPE, TRANSACTION_DT, REFUND_DT, CREATE_DT) VALUES (#{authTransactionId}, #{correlationId}, #{ctn}, #{itemName}, #{merchantName}, #{paymentDescription}, #{merchantContact}, #{total}, #{itemPrice}, #{tax}, #{subNo}, #{aceNo}, #{ban}, #{unitMdl}, #{feeType}, #{transactionType}, #{transactionDt}, #{refundDt}, SYSDATE)
